rule.conditionDesc: ( Escalated in SavedRecord = true AND Escalated in CurrentRecord = false)
rule.conditionXML: <XmlCondition><collection logical="" negate=""><condition logical="" negate="false"><operand type="field"><TableName>SavedRecord</TableName><FieldName caption="Escalated">escalated</FieldName></operand><Comparison>equals</Comparison><Value dataType="boolean">true</Value></condition><condition logical="AND" negate="false"><operand type="field"><TableName>CurrentRecord</TableName><FieldName caption="Escalated">escalated</FieldName></operand><Comparison>equals</Comparison><Value dataType="boolean">false</Value></condition></collection></XmlCondition>
rule.fullDesc: Set Escalation Manager via JavaScript (when ( Escalated in SavedRecord = true AND Escalated in CurrentRecord = false))
